Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate all the enemies in the Cavern of Hunger and Cavern of Slaughter and collect proof of cannibalism.

Likely cannibals include {@LinkCreature:8#3011#gula mutilator}, {@LinkCreature:8#3022#slavering auric imps}, {@LinkCreature:8#3031#gula ravagers}, {@LinkCreature:8#3041#gula overseers}, {@LinkCreature:8#3042#kobold thugs}, and {@LinkCreature:8#3051#kobold hirelings}.

Report to Rameria in Castanica when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
